pages.text: 37|103|akave, avviruvarum (iraivanin viruppattirku) murrilum panintu, (iprahim tan makan ismayilai aruttup paliyita) avarai mukankuppurak kitattinar
37|104|accamayam nam ‘‘iprahime!'' Ena alaittom
37|105|unmaiyakave nir umatu kanavai meyyakki vaittu vittir enrum, nanmai ceypavarkalukku nam ivvare kuli kotuppom'' (enrum kuri)
37|106|‘‘niccayamaka itutan maperum cotanaiyakum'' (enrum kurinom)
37|107|akave, makattanatoru paliyai avarukku pakaramakkinom
37|108|avarutaiya kirttiyaip pirkalattilum nilaikka vaittom
37|109|(akave, ulakattilulla anaivarume) ‘‘iprahimukku ‘‘salam'' (iterram) untavatakuka' (enrum kurukinranar)
37|110|ivvare, nanmai ceypavarkalukku nam kuli kotuppom
37|111|niccayamaka avar mikka nampikkaiyulla nam atiyarkalil iruntar
37|112|itan pinnar, nallatiyarkalilulla is'hak napiyai avarukku (marrumoru makanakat taruvataka) narceyti kurinom
37|113|avar mitum, is'hak mitum nam nam narpakkiyankalaic corintom. Avarkalutaiya cantatikalil nallavarkalum irukkinranar; pakirankamaka tamakkut tame tinkilaittuk kon(ta ket)tavarkalum irukkinranar
37|114|Niccayamaka nam musavin mitum, harun mitum arul purintom
37|115|avviruvaraiyum, avarkalutaiya makkalaiyum katumaiyana tunpattiliruntu patukattuk kontom
37|116|avarkalukku utavipurintom. Akave, avarkal (tankal etirikalai) verri kontarkal
37|117|avviruvarukkum telivana vetattaiyum nam kotuttom
37|118|avviruvaraiyum nerana valiyilum nam celuttinom
37|119|pirkalattilum avviruvarin kirttiyai nilaikkac ceytom
37|120|(akave, ulakattilullavarkal) musavukkum, harunukkum ‘‘salam'' iterram untavataka! (Enru kurukinranar)
37|121|niccayamaka nam ivvare nanmai ceypavarkalukkuk kuli kotukkirom
37|122|niccayamaka avviruvarum, nampikkai konta nam atiyarkalil iruntanar
37|123|niccayamaka ilyasum nam tutarkalil oruvartan
37|124|avar tan makkalai nokki, ‘‘ninkal (allahvukkup) payappata ventama?'' Enru kuriya camayattil
37|125|‘‘pataippavarkalil mika alakanavanai ninkal purakkanittu vittu, ‘pa'alu' ennum cilaiyai vanankukirirkala
37|126|unkal iraivanum, mun cenra unkal mutataiyarkalin iraivanumana allahvai vittu vitukirirkala
